Thing.name: additionalType
Thing.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: URL of an image of the item.

properties.name: acceptedPaymentMethod
properties.description: The payment method(s) accepted by seller for this offer.

properties.name: addOn
properties.description: An additional offer that can only be obtained in combination with the first base offer (e.g. supplements and extensions that are available for a surcharge).

properties.name: advanceBookingRequirement
properties.description: The amount of time that is required between accepting the offer and the actual usage of the resource or service.

properties.name: aggregateRating
properties.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

properties.name: availability
properties.description: The availability of this itemâ€”for example In stock, Out of stock, Pre-order, etc.

properties.name: availabilityEnds
properties.description: The end of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.

properties.name: availabilityStarts
properties.description: The beginning of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.

properties.name: availableAtOrFrom
properties.description: The place(s) from which the offer can be obtained (e.g. store locations).

properties.name: availableDeliveryMethod
properties.description: The delivery method(s) available for this offer.

properties.name: businessFunction
properties.description: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.

properties.name: category
properties.description: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

properties.name: deliveryLeadTime
properties.description: The typical delay between the receipt of the order and the goods leaving the warehouse.

properties.name: eligibleCustomerType
properties.description: The type(s) of customers for which the given offer is valid.

properties.name: eligibleDuration
properties.description: The duration for which the given offer is valid.

properties.name: eligibleQuantity
properties.description: The interval and unit of measurement of ordering quantities for which the offer or price specification is valid. This allows e.g. specifying that a certain freight charge is valid only for a certain quantity.

properties.name: eligibleRegion
properties.description: The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is valid.

properties.name: eligibleTransactionVolume
properties.description: The transaction volume, in a monetary unit, for which the offer or price specification is valid, e.g. for indicating a minimal purchasing volume, to express free shipping above a certain order volume, or to limit the acceptance of credit cards to purchases to a certain minimal amount.

properties.name: gtin13
properties.description: The GTIN-13 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This is equivalent to 13-digit ISBN codes and EAN UCC-13. Former 12-digit UPC codes can be converted into a GTIN-13 code by simply adding a preceeding zero.

properties.name: gtin14
properties.description: The GTIN-14 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

properties.name: gtin8
properties.description: The GTIN-8 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This code is also known as EAN/UCC-8 or 8-digit EAN.

properties.name: includesObject
properties.description: This links to a node or nodes indicating the exact quantity of the products included in the offer.

properties.name: inventoryLevel
properties.description: The current approximate inventory level for the item or items.

properties.name: itemCondition
properties.description: A predefined value from OfferItemCondition or a textual description of the condition of the product or service, or the products or services included in the offer.

properties.name: itemOffered
properties.description: The item being sold.

properties.name: mpn
properties.description: The Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

properties.name: price
properties.description: The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

properties.name: priceCurrency
properties.description: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the offer price or a price component, when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

properties.name: priceSpecification
properties.description: One or more detailed price specifications, indicating the unit price and delivery or payment charges.

properties.name: priceValidUntil
properties.description: The date after which the price is no longer available.

properties.name: review
properties.description: A review of the item.

properties.name: reviews
properties.description: Review of the item (legacy spelling; see singular form, review).

properties.name: seller
properties.description: The seller.

properties.name: serialNumber
properties.description: The serial number or any alphanumeric identifier of a particular product. When attached to an offer, it is a shortcut for the serial number of the product included in the offer.

properties.name: sku
properties.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.

properties.name: validFrom
properties.description: The beginning of the validity of offer, price specification, or opening hours data.

properties.name: validThrough
properties.description: The end of the validity of offer, price specification, or opening hours data.

properties.name: warranty
properties.description: The warranty promise(s) included in the offer.
